alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Marion; Schley; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 4:03AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Macon, eastern Marion, southwestern Crawford, Schley and Taylor Counties through 430 AM EST... At 403 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Tazewell, or 8 miles northwest of Ellaville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, Butler, Ellaville, Oglethorpe, Montezuma, Reynolds, Ideal, Putnam, Murrays Crossroads, Whitewater State Park, Fountainville, Rupert, Charing, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Mauk, Tazewell, Doyle and Winchester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
